6087.quoteText: We reserve the right, at any time and without prior notice, to remove or disable access to content at our discretion for any reason or no reason.
6087.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

6088.title: You maintain ownership of your data

6091.quoteText:
p>We will generally notify all users of any material changes to this policy through a notice on our Platform.
However, you should look at this policy regularly to check for any changes
6091.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

11629.quoteText:
<li>Some browsers transmit "do-not-track" signals to websites.
Because of differences in how browsers incorporate and activate this feature, it is not always clear whether users intend for these signals to be transmitted, or whether they even are aware of them.
We currently do not take action in response to these signals.
11629.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

11632.quoteText: AND YOU AND TIKTOK WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS-ACTION LAWSUIT OR CLASS-WIDE ARBITRATION.
11632.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.

11637.quoteText: EXCEPT FOR CERTAIN TYPES OF DISPUTES MENTIONED IN THAT ARBITRATION CLAUSE, YOU AND TIKTOK AGREE THAT DISPUTES BETWEEN US WILL BE RESOLVED BY MANDATORY BINDING ARBITRATION,
11637.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
